name: Sowing
description:
Siembra (Sowing) was a performance developed within the event "Legs without legs" organised by Belén Romero Gunset and Andrea Saemann in URRA Tigre in November 2018.

During the performance, I made seedlings and offered them to the spectators. From this action, I was interested in exploring the connection between the creation and development of a plant (and nature itself) and the idea of "nature" offering us food and nurture as a present and a responsibility.
body:
Performance, 15 minutes, 2018. URRA Tigre, Buenos Aires, Argentina.

Siembra (Sowing) was a performance developed within the event "Legs without legs" organised by Belén Romero Gunset and Andrea Saemann in URRA Tigre in November 2018. During the performance seedlings of pumpkin, spinach, carrot and chard were made and offered to the public.
